price: Allah will say, “Similarly Our verses came to you, but you ignored them, so you will be ignored Today.”
arabic: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ أَتَتۡكَ ءَايَٰتُنَا فَنَسِيتَهَاۖ وَكَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُنسَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
